step1.title: 1. Enter Amount
step1.description: Choose your cryptocurrency and enter the amount you want to exchange

step2.title: 2. Choose Payment
step2.description: Select your preferred payment method: Cryptocurrency or Visa

step3.title: 3. Confirm & Send
step3.description: Review the transaction details and confirm to complete your exchange

q1.question: What cryptocurrencies do you support?
q1.answer: We currently support Bitcoin (BTC), USDT, and Litecoin (LTC). More cryptocurrencies will be added soon.

q2.question: How long does the exchange process take?
q2.answer: Most exchanges are processed within 10-30 minutes, depending on network conditions.

q3.question: Is my payment information secure?
q3.answer: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your payment information.
